1631520.name: Kung Fu Jesus Soundtrack
1631520.description: The awesome official soundtrack for Kung Fu Jesus. A variety of songs from the game from various artists including Kung Fu Jesus, The Doomsday Device, Genrao, Liquid Skulls, San Toy, Vogelsang and more. Included is artwork from previous albums released before the game was even a thing. Noteworthy is that some of the songs have been played on BBC Radio 1 in the past, featured on Emmy Award winning documentaries and famous BBC shows from the past.
